Sources: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15871522/is-digest-function-in-r-suitable-for-anonymising-participant-identifiers

https://stackoverflow.com/a/15872968/5270873

```{r}
library(digest)

data <- data.frame(raw_id = c("alfonso", "janet"), hours = c(12, 10))
data

passphrase <- "my_very_long_password_1234"       # to be changed each time
data$raw_id <- paste(data$raw_id, passphrase)

# we add a new column `id` for the anonymized data
data$id <- sapply(data$raw_id, function(X) digest(X, algo="sha1"))
data[c("raw_id", "id")]
```
